at.ac.univie.pantobot.model

Class DBAccessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.ac.univie.pantobot.model.DBAccessor

  • public class DBAccessor
extends java.lang.Object
    Retrieves information from assets/data.json and Stores it into Topic model class Note: URL can be null (all topics with language:en have no url), forecast_pos marked -111 represents NaN in original data

      • searchDB

        public java.util.ArrayList<Topic> searchDB(java.lang.String search_field,
                                           java.lang.String search_content)
        Search through JSONString, that was obtained in Constructor
        Parameters:
        search_field - Selected Field, such as topic, domain, platform, related_topic, ...
        search_content - Specify text to search for, for instance APPLE MUSIC(topic), energy(domain) and so on.
        Returns:
        ArrayList of topics, those content matched the search input.

        Returns:
